name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, bacon, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza made with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: A breaded and fried chicken breast topped with tomato sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Risotto alla Milanese
description: A creamy rice dish made with beef broth, saffron, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Osso Buco
description: Braised veal shanks served with a flavorful tomato-based sauce.

name: Lasagna
description: A classic Italian casserole made with layers of pasta, ground beef, tomato sauce, and cheese.

name: Tiramisu
description: Tiramisu is a classic Italian dessert made with layers of ladyfingers soaked in coffee and liqueur, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder. It's rich, creamy, and decadent.

name: Gnocchi alla Sorrentina
description: Gnocchi alla Sorrentina is a classic Italian pasta dish made with potato gnocchi, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil. It's hearty, comforting, and perfect for any occasion.

name: Pizza Margherita
description: Pizza Margherita is a classic Neapolitan pizza made with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil. It's simple, delicious, and the perfect representation of Italian cuisine.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: Pesto Pasta is a classic Italian dish made with spaghetti, pesto sauce, and Parmesan cheese. It's simple, yet flavorful, and can be made in under 30 minutes.
